description: candle stand with large single pricket, revolving arms for two smaller candles of later date; standard is tapered to a height short of five feet; from the upper polyhedral knob four riveted brackets enclosing flat-work trefoils support a circular carriage; two extended and superposed arms, collared upon the central candle base and revolvable upon the circular strap carry the two smaller lights
dimension:
56 in. (142.24 cm)
16 in. (40.64 cm) (width, bottom)
22 5/8 in. (57.47 cm) (width, top)
title: Candle stand
